remarks: A pair index picks out two instances of an indexed union's argument. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Feb-2018.)
statement:
iunxprg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> C = D ) $.
iunxprg.2 $e |- ( x = B -> C = E ) $.
iunxprg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> U_ x e. { A , B } C = ( D u. E ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
